channel.title: Adventure games for girls on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Adventure games for girls on Game6r

item.title: Frozen Double Trouble
item.description: Anna and Christophe go in search of Princess Elsa, who several years ago left her native castle and went to a distant snowy desert. By controlling the movements of the characters in the game, try to go through all the stages of an exciting journey and find the magnificent fairy-tale castle of the Ice Queen.

item.title: Hero In Super Action Adventure
item.description: All the kingdoms of the fairy-tale world are attacked by terrible monsters that absorb bright colors from all living things. Only the famous fox Windy can save the magical land from black and white slavery. Set off on a journey with a brave little girl, defeat an army of nightmarish monsters and return the paints they stole.

item.title: Snail Bob 6 Winter Story
item.description: A famous adventurer accidentally found an ancient map and is going in search of the treasure chest indicated on it. The kid invites you to go on a journey with him. Help the snail overcome all the obstacles on the way and get to the ancient temple, which houses the relics of the lost snail civilization.
